backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with types and state for budgets, expenses, attendance, holidays, reminders, and includes admin‑gated holiday management functions.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old attendance types to new ones and initializes an empty global holidays map.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, associated frontend files, components, and test IDs for attendance calendar, date editor, and holiday management.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for many frontend files describing UI components, hooks, state, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and styles for light/dark themes and base layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app and sets branding metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component setting up global state, query client, tab navigation, and responsive layout with sidebar or mobile tabs.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Atten: Editor component for modifying a single day's attendance status and times, with validation and save handling.
Renders a month-view calendar with attendance and holiday indicators, supporting date selection and month navigation.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Holid: Admin-only interface to view, add, and delete holiday entries for the selected month.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for authentication status and errors.
frontend/src/components/deskboard/ClockC: Displays a real-time clock and a small calendar for the current month.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Global React error boundary that catches runtime errors and offers reset or reload options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Provides the top header UI with login, attendance navigation, and Excel upload/replace functionality including workbook parsing and validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with a header, footer, main content area, and in‑app reminder notifier.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSi: Renders the desktop sidebar navigation with tooltips and tab switching for main and activity sections.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Displays in-app reminder toast notifications with sound playback and dismiss controls.
frontend/src/components/reminders/TechHe: Shows an animated or fallback tech-hero character image with error handling.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultRo: Modal for editing a single results row with form fields mapped to each header and save/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/search/ExploreHe: Inline Google search results panel with iframe rendering, fallback handling, and open‑in‑tab option.
frontend/src/components/table/DataPrevie: Displays sheet headers and rows in a scrollable table with empty-state handling and horizontal scrolling.
frontend/src/components/table/Horizontal: Simple wrapper enabling horizontal scrolling for wide table content.
frontend/src/components/updateChecking/U: Search bar for update-checking results with keyword input, match-type selection, and clear action.
frontend/src/components/vlookup/VlookupA: Generates and animates step-by-step VLOOKUP logic, highlighting scanned rows and returning a match or not-found result.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendance.ts: Provides attendance-related queries and mutations, including config, check-in/out, and summaries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useHolidays.ts: Handles fetching and mutating global holiday data and admin checks via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInAppReminderNotif: Polls reminders and triggers in-app notifications when reminders become due, with cleanup for outdated notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing identity, login, logout, and status through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityMutati: Provides React Query mutations for creating and deleting reminders and stubs out unavailable calendar and to‑do item features with errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityQuerie: Defines frontend types and React Query hooks for fetching reminders and returns empty lists for unsupported calendar, to‑do, and note features.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements history listing, filtering, adding, and clearing using React Query with actor-based backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegularExpense.ts: Contains budget and expense queries and mutations with validation, authentication checks, and history logging.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens, macOS-inspired UI classes, and deskboard background styling.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/dateRanges.t: Utility functions for formatting dates, computing week/month/year ranges, and converting durations and timestamps.
frontend/src/lib/compare/compareWorkbook: Compares spreadsheet data by key, rows, or columns and returns structured differences and summaries.
frontend/src/lib/compare/filterCompariso: Filters comparison rows by keyword across key and cell values using exact or contains matching.
frontend/src/lib/compare/normalizeRowSig: Creates deterministic row signatures and aligns old rows to new header orders for comparison.
frontend/src/lib/excel/normalizeHeader.t: Normalizes, sanitizes, and searches Excel headers to ensure consistent naming and indexing.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseWorkbook.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and converts Excel sheets into sanitized SheetData structures.
Builds date‑filtered expense reports with totals and generates report filenames.
frontend/src/lib/export/branding.ts: Provides branding config and helpers to load logo and watermark assets as images or base64.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportPdf.ts: Generates branded landscape PDFs with headers, watermark, and tabular export data.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportXlsx.ts: Exports data to Excel with a branding title row using dynamically loaded SheetJS.
frontend/src/lib/export/pdfCompanyInfo.t: Defines company contact and footer info for PDF exports.
frontend/src/lib/results/applyRowEdits.t: Applies edited rows to a base dataset using a map of original indices.
frontend/src/lib/results/exportFilters.t: Provides helpers to list filterable columns, extract unique column values, and filter table rows by a selected column and value.
frontend/src/lib/results/historyExport.t: Maps history entry types to labels and exports history data to Excel or PDF using shared export utilities.
frontend/src/lib/vlookup/vlookup.ts: Implements a VLOOKUP function with exact and approximate matching, supporting multiple return columns and detailed result metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AttendanceTab.tsx: Implements the full attendance management UI, including check‑in/out, settings, summaries, calendars, holidays, and editing entries.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarTab.tsx: Displays and manages user calendar events, including creating and deleting events through dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/DeskboardTab.tsx: Builds the main dashboard with search, productivity widgets, and quick‑add dialogs for reminders, todos, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryTab.tsx: Shows and filters user history entries, supports clearing history, and provides export to Excel or PDF.
frontend/src/pages/NotesTab.tsx: Renders a notes management UI allowing authenticated users to create and delete notes via associated hooks. Includes a dialog for adding notes and displays existing notes with loading and auth states.
frontend/src/pages/RegularExpenseTab.tsx: Provides UI for managing budgets and regular expenses, including add/edit/delete flows, data validation, and report export to PDF. Syncs with backend via multiple expense-related hooks and handles authentication and actor readiness.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersTab.tsx: Implements a reminder management interface where authenticated users can add and delete general reminders. Uses dialogs for creation and handles errors with user-friendly messaging.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsTab.tsx: Displays search and update-checking results with options to edit rows and export filtered or edited data to Excel/PDF. Manages edit state, export filters, and integrates history tracking.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides VLOOKUP and filter tools for workbook data, updating global state with results and recording history entries. Handles input parsing, validation, and background search/filter operations.
frontend/src/pages/TodoTab.tsx: Renders a to‑do list UI with create, toggle, and delete actions backed by productivity hooks and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/UpdateCheckingTab.tsx: Provides Excel update‑checking by uploading a new file, selecting a key column, comparing sheets, and recording history entries.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTab.tsx: Handles Excel file uploads, parses sheets, updates global workbook state, and records upload history while showing previews and errors.
frontend/src/state/appState.tsx: Defines global app state for workbook data, searches, comparisons, history, and update helpers with context providers and normalization logic.
frontend/src/utils/attendance/configMapp: Provides helpers to convert time values, validate attendance config inputs, and build AttendanceConfig objects.
frontend/src/utils/errors/userFriendlyEr: Maps raw errors into user‑friendly messages with fallback handling while logging full details.
frontend/src/utils/number/parseNatBigInt: Parses and validates numeric strings into Nat‑safe bigints and exposes validation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them as needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, planned attendance calendar features, global holiday management requirements, and related backend needs.
